RainbruRPG::Install

RainbruRPG::Install Namespace Reference

Detailed Description

The namespace of the RainbruRPG Install program.

The Install namespace provides the fltk Gui needed to install RainbruRPG, and several versions of the installer :

  • Linux
  • Win32
